name: Aquattack!
description:
Aquattack! is an engrossing puzzle game set beneath the waves. The ocean's fish are being swept up in fishing nets, and need your help to escape. Slide rows of fish vertically and horizontally to create matches and set the fish free.
Save as many fish as you can before the time runs out and the fisherman haul in their nets! Try to beat your highest score in the addictive 'arcade mode', or pit your wits against the clock in one of the 50 challenges available in the fiendish 'challenge mode'.
